attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is on behalf of all manchester united supporters to try get malcolm glazer out of manchester united football club as he has bought the club with borrowed money which leaves the club having to pay massive interest rates talks of selling old trafford and the carrington training complex and its only time before we have to sell our best players somethig has to be done and fast   GLAZER OUT  LUHG

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
